Text: The humble bundle is for charity, are you guys seriously uploading this shit here? Fucking disgraceful.

Many of those theese days, include urself:P

And i dont give a shit of what people call me, im getting used to it XD

Yea say what u want but i still dont give a fuck;)

i only provide with games, softwares and music, if people dont like the torrents or what i say, then so be it
If you can't pay a cent for this or a dollar, you should be shot in the head for downloading it.

lol, the creators minimum donate was a cent:P

But i donated a dollar^^ and just to tell the reason i did it:

I had about a dollar left on my prepaid visa card, and why not donate the little i had left there to a game company?:P the card's expiration date was a few days from now and i just paid it to get the card out of my wallet:P
here's a group that tracks indie bundles for people that keep missing them http://steamcommunity.com/groups/IndieBundleTracker
